name: Send an email alert when a fulfillment is cancelled

options.email_subject__required: A fulfillment for order {{ fulfillment.order.name | default: "an order" }} was cancelled
options.email_body__multiline_required: Hello, A fulfillment with {{ fulfillment.line_items.size }} line item(s) was cancelled. Manage this order in Shopify Thanks, Mechanic, for {{ shop.name }}

docs:
Useful for keeping an eye on unexpected cancellations by third party shipping services.

This task performs two actions: one to send an email, and one to "remember" that an email has been sent. (Without this second action, this task would send an email every time a cancelled fulfillment is updated.)
